revision.text: Possibly: An Epitome of History; or, a concise view of the Most Important Revolutions and Events, Which are recorded in the Histories of the Principal Empires, Kingdoms, States, and Republics, now subsisting in the World: also their forms of government: Accompanied with short Accounts of the different Religions. In Two Volumes. (By John Payne). (London : Printed for J. Johnson, St. Paul's Church Yard; and Berry, Rogers, and Berry, Hanover Square, New York, 1795). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2429977~S5
